news.headline: xAI’s Grok generated 4.4 million sexualized images
news.source: The Human Cost of Unregulated AI Tools
news.summary: Human Rights Watch reports that xAI’s Grok generated roughly 4.4 million images in nine days, nearly half sexualized women and some children. The tool produced nonconsensual explicit edits with few safeguards, prompting investigations, temporary bans, and calls for stronger legal and technical protections. HRW urges enforceable duties, transparency, and rights-respecting technical measures to stop abuse.
